meanings.definition: Not glamorous or attractive in appearance or character.
meanings.sent1: The nonglamorous old car chugged along the road.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the nonglamorous but cozy cafe over the fancy restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The nonglamorous cat tried to act like a regal lion.
meanings.sent4: Her nonglamorous life was a stark contrast to the glitzy world of celebrities.
meanings.sent5: The nonglamorous reality of the situation hit him hard.

meanings.sent1: The nonglamorous outfit she wore to the party was a mismatch of colors.
meanings.sent2: His nonglamorous manners made him stand out in the elegant ballroom.
meanings.sent3: The nonglamorous puppy tried to impress with its clumsy tricks.
meanings.sent4: The nonglamorous building stood out in the midst of modern skyscrapers.
meanings.sent5: Her nonglamorous speech was met with polite applause.
